# Operating System generated files
## macOS
### macOS file and folder metadata
.DS_Store
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride
.Icon?
._*
.DocumentRevisions-V100
.fseventsd
.Spotlight-V100
.TemporaryItems
.Trashes
.VolumeIcon.icns
.com.apple.timemachine.donotpresent
.AppleDB
.AppleDesktop
Network Trash Folder
Temporary Items
.apdisk

## Windows
### Thumbnail cache files
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
ehthumbs_vista.db

### System files
Desktop.ini
$RECYCLE.BIN/
pagefile.sys
hiberfil.sys
swapfile.sys

### Temporary and backup files
~$*
*~
*.tmp
*.bak
*.old
*.orig
*.log

### Windows shortcuts
*.lnk

### Security identifier for downloaded files
:*Zone.Identifier

## Linux
### Image cache files
.xvpics

## Editors and IDEs
### IntelliJ/Android Studio
.idea/

### Vim swap/backup files
*.swp
*.swo
*~

## Build Output and Dependencies
### Compiled output directories
bin/
obj/
dist/

## Virtual Machines
### Virtual disk images
*.vmdk
*.vdi
*.vhd
*.vhdx

## Confidential Information
### Envs
.env
.env.production
.env.prod
.env.keys

### SSH
*.ssh
*.ssh-key
id_rsa

# OpenSSL-related files best not committed

## Certificate Authority
*.ca

## Certificate
*.crt

## Certificate Sign Request
*.csr

## Certificate
*.der

## Key database file
*.kdb

## OSCP request data
*.org

## PKCS #12
*.p12

## PEM-encoded certificate data
*.pem

## Random number seed
*.rnd

## SSLeay data
*.ssleay

## S/MIME message
*.smime
